name: BoF1LL: A Withering World DEMO
description:
A fun, lighthearted, cozy couch co-op (or solo experience) following our two characters, Bo & F1LL, who are working together to restore their withering world.

Solve puzzles, search for Bo's family, and gather Essence & Fragments to rebuild the heart of the Isle!

A dynamic world that reacts in real-time to your actions, as you play through BoF1LL, you’ll see the Isle slowly being restored from a gloomy landscape to a vibrant isle.

What is BoF1LL: A Withering World?
  • Unique gameplay abilities and interactions for each character
  • Explore a beautifully hand-crafted world and be rewarded with collectibles
  • Solve each area’s secret!
  • Fight back the storms destroying the land
  • Restore the landscape back to its beautiful state!
  • Unravel the mystery of what’s happening to the Isle
  • See your interactions with the world unfold in real-time
  • Couch Co-op (can be played solo too!)
What is this Demo for?
  • Having players test out the gameplay and provide feedback to team
  • Identifying any issues or bugs (report here or on Discord)
  • Helping the devs polish this demo for publishers
  • Sampling some of systems the full game will contain

The demo takes approximately 30-45 minutes to complete. Please note, saving has been disabled.

Join our Discord to discuss the Demo: http://discord.gg/atuRdV8Azr

Wishlist us on Steam: 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1659190/BoF1LL_A_Withering_World/

Installation
  1. Download the Zip folder
  2. Unzip the zipped folder
  3. Click into BOF1LL DEMO V1 Folder
  4. Double click BOF1LL DEMO.exe
  5. Enjoy
  6. Submit feedback on Itch or our Discord!
